short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Keep track of all the neccessary URL's and make available whenever required

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Why URL Keeper?
Well, when applying for any job or filling out any form with so many social media links to be copied every time from the other pages and pasting it can be a little time consuming. 
But now, its a little easier with the URL Keeper.
Save your important links to the extension and use them whenever required.
By just clicking on the icon of the particular link icon can copy the saved the URL to the clipboard and you can use it to paste wherever you want, letting you without leaving the page to copy externally, saving a little time can be so important.
